releaseNotes: - Updated home screen: Tap to enable/disable accents & long press to edit/delete
- App can now use system accent colour
- Fix issues while restoring accents in Oreo
- Backups now show more info(file size & no. of apps)
- Most of the work is now done in the background
- Added Italian(by Montelion) & Turkish(by Alperen-Ozturk) translations
